editorialNotes.tagline: Listen to books wherever you are
editorialNotes.standard: We love how much there is to explore with this app for audio lovers. With audiobooks, podcasts, radio plays, language courses and Audible Originals you won’t find anywhere else, there's so much to explore – even beyond just books.
There’s only one thing easier than visiting your local library: bringing it to you. Simply link your library card and log in to freely access ebooks, audiobooks and magazines.
editorialNotes.short: ‣ For readers, Libby allows you to check out books from your local library—directly on your iPad.
